title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-4.10 - Department Review and Support
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-4.10 - Department Review and Support

State Regulations

The commissioner may require additional documents and/or
artifacts for review of an LEA's STEPS plan to determine compliance with

Education Law §3012-e, as well as to provide feedback and recommendations to
support teacher and principal growth. The commissioner may require modification
of a STEPS plan if it does not adhere to the requirements of Education Law
§3012-e. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
30-4.10

Adopted

New

York State Register March 26, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 12, eff. 3/26/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. The commissioner may require additional documents and/or artifacts for review of a LEA's STEPS plan to determine compliance with Education Law §3012-e, as well as to provide feedback and recommendations to support teacher and principal growth. The commissioner may require modification of a STEPS plan if it does not adhere to the requirements of Education Law §3012-e. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
30-4.10

Adopted

New York State Register February 19, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 07, eff. 2/3/2025, exp. 4/3/2025
(Emergency)
